participant_1.name: Isabella Cruz
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, Isabella is enthusiastic and enjoys sharing her experiences.
participant_1.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

participant_2.name: Frank Thompson
participant_2.personality: Frank is caring and has a strong sense of community, always willing to help others in need.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

content.text: Have you ever been to gym?
I was poor growing up so my heigh is only enough to be a retired gym teacher
hope that will slap some sence into you
